Package de.ancash.bazaar.core.dao

Class StatisticsDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ancash.bazaar.core.dao.StatisticsDAO
  • public class StatisticsDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides access to all recorded transactions and allows to manually record a transaction.
